str2: In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From hagios; to make holy, i.e. purify or consecrate; to venerate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To cleanse, make clean, literally, ceremonially, or spiritually, according to context. From katharos; to cleanse.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A bath (of water, not the vessel), water for washing, washing. From louo; a bath, i.e., baptism.
Water. And genitive case, hudatos, etc. From the base of huetos; water literally or figuratively.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
From rheo; an utterance, ; by implication, a matter or topic; with a negative naught whatever.
